abilities.name: Crystal Veil
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon VMAX, except any Glaceon VMAX.

attacks.name: Max Icicle
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
